data.title: [French] Final Fantasy XII - Kiss Me Goodbye (mioune feat. PianoFortress) by Mioune
data.meta_description: Stream [French] Final Fantasy XII - Kiss Me Goodbye (mioune feat. PianoFortress) by Mioune on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2013-01-27T13:15:10Z

Here is my French adaptation of "Kiss Me Goodbye" from "Final Fantasy XII"!! As always, I chose to adapt from the Japanese lyrics and not the English ones :) It's probably one of the hardest FF songs I ever recorded for the pitch is kind of weird to me (I don't feel really confortable with it :() But I love this song so much that I had to give it a try! The amazing piano instrumental was played by http://www.youtube.com/PianoFortress (who played for Serah's Theme (FFXIII-2) too ( http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wbZgFPmJsYI )! Once again, thanks so much to him for playing and recording the song for me!! With all the imperfections you may find in this adaptation and interpretation, I do hope you'll like it!! :3 Lyrics: MÃªme si un jour tu te crois seul, te sens perdu (Even if one day you feel lonely, you feel lost) Il y aura toujours une issue (There will always be a way out) N'es-tu toujours pas satisfait? Es-tu heureux? ( Aren't you still not satisfied? Are you happy?) Avec un monde fait pour nous deux ? (With a world made for the two of us?) Etends tes ailes, lÃ dans le ciel (Spread your wings here in the sky) Crois et tout lÃ -haut envole-toi (Believe and up there, fly) Baiser d'adieu, mÃ©moire d'un amour (Farewell kiss, a love's memory) MÃªme si je sais, je t'ai perdu pour toujours (Even if I know, I lost you forever) Les souvenirs de notre histoire (Memories of our story) Ont mis en moi une force que je n'avais pas (Have put a strenght in me I didn't have before) Tu cherches toujours et encore la certitude (You're still looking for certainty) Cette chose que tout le monde adule (This thing that is adulated by everybody) Je sais bien qu'un impassible amour demeure lÃ tout au fond de ton cÅur (I know that an impassive love rests inside your heart) Baiser d'adieu, adieu mon amour (Farewell kiss, farewell my love) Si nous avions pu changer pour un nouveau Â« nous Â» (If only we could've changed for a new "us") Baiser d'adieu, je ne pleurerais pas (Farewell kiss, I won't cry) Tu peux Ãªtre aimÃ© une nouvelle fois (You can be loved once again) Baiser d'adieu, adieu mon amour (Farewell kiss, farewell my love) Tu peux Ãªtre aimÃ© Ã nouveau un jour... (You can be loved once again, one day...)

Genre

Final Fantasy
